verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Light of the world newline You stepped down into darkness newline Opened my eyes, let me see newline Beauty that made this heart adore You newline Hope of a life spent with You

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Here I am to worship newline Here I am to bow down newline Here I am to say that You're my God newline You're altogether lovely newline Altogether worthy newline Altogether wonderful to me

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: King of all days newline Oh so highly exalted newline Glorious in Heaven above newline Humbly You came to the earth You created newline All for Love's sake became poor

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: I'll never know how much it cost newline To see my sin upon that cross
